description:
An AGCM experiment with monthly-varying SSTs and sea-ice taken from each model's own piControl simulation (using the 30 years of piControl that are parallel to years 111-140 of its abrupt4xCO2 run) but with a uniform SST increase of 4K. Dynamic vegetation should be turned off.
Same as piSST-control but with SSTs uniformly increased by 4K.
keywords: CFMIP, Tier 2, Pre-industrial SST plus 4K, PI forcing
rationale: To understand regional climate responses to CO2 forcing.
